report.title: Explore occurrences map (standard filters)
report.description: A list of occurrences including geometry information designed for mapping output.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

param.name: max_sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the max square size to show if low precision grid refs in dataset

joins.join: JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_10km_id and msq.size=10000

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(o.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title then trim(substring(o.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else o.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
